Features.title: Our Powerful Features
Features.content: Everything you need to learn, create, and connect with the Shan community

app.FontConverter: Convert Shan fonts to any font
app.TaiLeConverter: Convert Shan script to Tai Le script
app.ShanTranslit: Convert Shan script to Latin script
app.ShanSyllable: Convert Shan script to syllable work break
app.TaiLeSyllable: Convert Tai Le script to syllable work break
app.ShanWordSorting: Sort Shan words by syllable work break
app.ShanProverbs: Learn Shan proverbs and their meanings

Download.safari_step1: Tap the share button at the bottom of the screen
Download.safari_step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'

acceptance_of_terms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By accessing and using ShanHub, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description_of_service.title: Description of Service
description_of_service.content: ShanHub is a platform dedicated to preserving and promoting the Shan language and culture through technology. Our services include:
services: Shan language learning tools and applications
Font conversion and text processing utilities
Cultural content including proverbs, songs, and calendar
Community features for Shan language speakers

user_responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.content: As a user of ShanHub, you agree to:
responsibilities: Use the service for lawful purposes only
Respect the intellectual property rights of others
Not attempt to harm or disrupt the service
Respect other users and maintain a positive community environment

privacy_and_data.title: လွင်ႈသုၼ်ႇတူဝ်လႄႈၶေႃႈမုၼ်း
privacy_and_data.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using our service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

contact_information.title: Contact Information
contact_information.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our official channels or community forums.

footer.content: Thank you for being part of the ShanHub community and helping preserve the Shan language and culture.

personal_information.title: Personal Information
personal_information.content: When you use Google or Facebook for authentication, we collect basic profile information including your name, email address, and profile picture as provided by Google.

usage_data.title: Usage Data
usage_data.content: We collect information about how you interact with our applications, including features used, time spent, and general usage patterns to improve our services.

how_we_use_your_information.title: How We Use Your Information
how_we_use_your_information.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
purposes: To provide and maintain our services
To authenticate and secure your account
To improve and optimize our applications
To communicate important updates or changes
To provide customer support when needed

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances:
circumstances: To protect our rights and prevent fraud

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information:
rights: Access and review your personal data
Request deletion of your account and data

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our official channels or community forums.

footer.content: Thank you for being part of the ShanHub community and helping preserve the Shan language and culture.

AboutPage.title: About ShanHub
AboutPage.subtitle: Preserving and promoting Shan language and culture through technology
AboutPage.mission_content: ShanHub is dedicated to preserving, promoting, and revitalizing the Shan language and culture through innovative technology solutions. We believe that language is the cornerstone of cultural identity, and our platform serves as a bridge between traditional Shan heritage and modern digital tools.
AboutPage.vision_content: To create a thriving digital ecosystem where the Shan language and culture can flourish, connecting Shan speakers worldwide and ensuring that our rich linguistic heritage is preserved for future generations.

features.learning_tools: Interactive learning tools and applications for mastering the Shan language
features.cultural_content: Rich cultural content including traditional proverbs, songs, and calendar systems
features.community: A vibrant community platform for Shan language speakers to connect and share
features.preservation: Digital preservation initiatives to safeguard Shan linguistic heritage
features.accessibility: Free and accessible tools for everyone in the Shan community

AboutPage.team_content: ShanHub is developed by passionate members of the Shan community who understand the importance of preserving our language and culture. Our team combines traditional knowledge with modern technology to create meaningful solutions.

origin_developer.title: Origin of Tools
origin_developer.content_2: Sai Mao is a Android developer and build a lot of Shan tools for free and open source.

next_developer.title: Continue Building
next_developer.content_1: ShanHub is now maintained by me
next_developer.content_2: I am is a full-stack developer and work on ShanHub in my free time and make it accessible to everyone and on every platform.

AboutPage.join_content: Whether you're a native speaker, a learner, or someone interested in Shan culture, you're welcome to join our community and contribute to preserving this beautiful language.
AboutPage.footer_text: Thank you for being part of our journey to preserve and promote the Shan language and culture.

SupportPage.title: Support ShanHub
SupportPage.subtitle: Help us preserve and promote Shan language and culture
SupportPage.intro_content: ShanHub is a community-driven platform dedicated to preserving the Shan language and culture. Your support helps us maintain our services, develop new features, and ensure that our tools remain free and accessible to everyone in the Shan community.

impact_items.development: Fund the development of new language learning tools and applications
impact_items.content: Support the creation of educational content and cultural resources
impact_items.community: Enable community events and cultural preservation initiatives

SupportPage.ways_content: There are many ways you can support ShanHub and our mission:

ways_items.financial: Financial contributions to support development and maintenance
ways_items.volunteer: Volunteer your time and skills to help improve our platform
ways_items.content: Contribute cultural content, translations, or educational materials
ways_items.community: Help build and moderate our community spaces
ways_items.feedback: Provide feedback and suggestions to help us improve
ways_items.share: Share ShanHub with others in the Shan community

SupportPage.contact_content: Ready to support our mission? We'd love to hear from you! Whether you want to make a financial contribution, volunteer your time, or contribute in other ways, every bit of support helps preserve and promote our beautiful Shan language and culture.
SupportPage.thank_you: Thank you for supporting the preservation of Shan language and culture!

support_dialog.title: Thank you for your support

DashboardPage.subtitle: Explore our collection of Shan language and culture tools

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ShanHub

what_is_shanhub.question: What is ShanHub?
what_is_shanhub.answer: ShanHub is a comprehensive platform dedicated to preserving, promoting, and revitalizing the Shan language and culture through innovative technology solutions. We provide a collection of free tools and applications for learning, converting, and working with the Shan language.

who_can_use.question: Who can use ShanHub?
who_can_use.answer: ShanHub is designed for everyone interested in the Shan language and culture - native speakers, learners, researchers, educators, and anyone who wants to explore or preserve this beautiful language. All our tools are free and accessible to everyone.

is_free.question: Is ShanHub completely free?
is_free.answer: Yes! ShanHub is completely free to use. We believe that language preservation and cultural tools should be accessible to everyone in the Shan community, regardless of their financial situation.

supported_devices.question: What devices and browsers are supported?
supported_devices.answer: ShanHub works on all modern devices including computers, tablets, and smartphones. We support all major browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. You can also install ShanHub as a Progressive Web App (PWA) on your device for a native app experience.

why_login_required.question: Why do I need to login?
why_login_required.answer: Login is required to access certain features, participate in the community, and contribute to our platform. It also helps us understand our user base and improve our services.

data_privacy.question: How is my data handled?
data_privacy.answer: We take your privacy seriously. ShanHub processes most data locally in your browser when possible. We don't store personal information unless you choose to create an account, and we never share your data with third parties. Please read our Privacy Policy for detailed information.

available_apps.question: What applications are currently available?
available_apps.answer: ShanHub offers various tools including LikDai (typing tutor), font converters, script converters (Shan to Tai Le, Shan to Latin), syllable analyzers, word sorting tools, traditional proverbs collection, Shan songs (DokSu), traditional calendar (PakPi), and note-taking applications.

new_features.question: How often are new features added?
new_features.answer: We continuously work on improving existing tools and adding new features based on community feedback and needs. Major updates are typically released monthly, with smaller improvements and bug fixes released more frequently.

feature_requests.question: Can I request new features or tools?
feature_requests.answer: Absolutely! We encourage community feedback and feature requests. You can reach out through our community platform, social media, or contact us directly. Community-driven development is at the heart of ShanHub.

get_help.question: How can I get help or support?
get_help.answer: You can get help through our community platform where users help each other, check this FAQ section, or contact us directly.

contribute.question: How can I contribute to ShanHub?
contribute.answer: There are many ways to contribute: provide feedback, report bugs, suggest features, help with translations, contribute cultural content, share ShanHub with others, or support us financially. Every contribution helps preserve and promote the Shan language.

report_issues.question: How do I report bugs or issues?
report_issues.answer: If you encounter any bugs or issues, please report them through our community platform or contact us directly. Include as much detail as possible about the problem, including what device and browser you're using.

support_financial.question: How can I support ShanHub financially?
support_financial.answer: You can support ShanHub financially by buying us a coffee. Your support helps us maintain our services, develop new features, and ensure that our tools remain free and accessible to everyone in the Shan community.

contact.title: Still Have Questions?
contact.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Join our community or reach out to us directly. We're here to help you make the most of ShanHub.
